translation.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

author_blurb.en: Translated for SuttaCentral by Sujato Bhikkhu

translation.title: Five Discourses on Not Penetrating Form, Etc.

next.name: Five Discourses on Not Distinguishing Form, Etc.

previous.name: Five Discourses on Not Understanding Form, Etc.

segments.en: 21–25. Five Discourses on Not Penetrating Form, Etc.

segments.pli: Sāvatthinidānaṃ. Ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo … pe ….
“Rūpe kho, vaccha, appaṭivedhā … pe … viññāṇe kho, vaccha, appaṭivedhā … pe ….
segments.en: “Vaccha, it is because of not comprehending form …”

suttaplex.blurb: The wanderer Vacchagotta asks the Buddha why the various speculative views come to be. The Buddha replies that it is because of not penetrating the five aggregates.
suttaplex.translated_title: Five Discourses on Not Penetrating Form, Etc.
